Dialogue.Page: Welcome to my Assortment Of planets, I hope you enjoy finding it's secrets!
You can use the Black Holes on the floor to warp wherever you want to go.
Theres a signal on the in front of each of them indicating which planet is linked to that Black Hole.
Now...What planet would you want to explore first?
It's always a good idea to start from below.
Jötunn is a really cold planet, it's kinda hard to live in and it's so dark but
There lives Gin, a good friend of mine, he likes living there i don't know why...
Enter in the black hole on my left when you feel ready and it'll warp you there.
Good Luck with it!
Midas is a beatutiful planet filled with molten gold.
(It's actually golden tinted water buti shouldn't be telling you that...)
Now...Good Luck! You sure will need some, this one is a little scarier than Gaia.
Uhh, this is getting complicated, Surtr is not a great planet to visit as it's pretty deadly.
It's suffocating in there, the opposite of "Jötunn", be carefull with the lava though.
I'm linked to a Mnemonic statue too so seeing you wake up here again and again it's making me starting to like you UwU.
Ready? Then use the Black Hole next to the campfire and you'll get there in no time.
Have you already explored "Jötunn"?
Well, I actually don't care... Gaia is a nice place, really pretty, full of nature and beauty.
Without further ado, enjoy your stay.
Feel free to use the black hole next to Jötunn's one.
OHHHHH Really? Do you want to go to "The Lair"?

DialogueOption.Text: Don't underestimate me, I'll make it!

Dialogue.Page: First of all, don't talk to me that way...
But... Hi, I'm the mods creator spiritual representation in Outer Wilds.
His name is Fixxion, you can contact him through many different ways.
You can always do it from discords official Outer Wilds modding server to tell him any suggestions you have, he sure will listen.
Though he is mainly on Youtube, on a channel called: "Fixxion's Lair" where he does spanish videogame content. Especially Outer Wilds content.
So make sure to check it out if you are interested!
Wise choice, talk to me again if you want to try the other planets.
HAHAHAHA, I like your spirit, Just make sure you dont... Well... you will find out by yourself.
See ya! Or not, just try not to make a lot of noise...
